> Get together in teams, build a LEGO® structure, and document the process—fun and interactive icebreaker activity to introduce the concept of reproducibility.\
<font size="2"> *Image credit: NCEAS Learning Hub* </font>

## {{< fa scroll >}} Description
This interactive activity requires participants to build a structure using LEGO®. The challenging part comes when documenting the process so others can replicate what you made. This activity is a great icebreaker to get everyone talking about the importance of clear documentation for reproducible workflows.

## {{< fa check >}} Prerequisites
- None

## {{< fa bullseye >}} Learning Goal
- Illustrate elements of good reproducibility through the medium of LEGO®
- Discuss what is needed and what is not needed for good reproducibility

## <i class="fa-regular fa-clock"></i> Duration
1 hour

**In person only**
